entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 12:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 60 gusting to 90 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
